feature_model.name: Web annotator feature model

meta.data: Feature model to create web annotator products

feature_model.feature_tree: :r WEB ANNOTATOR(_r) :m ANNOTATION(_r_1) :m CREATE(_r_1_9) :m DELETE(_r_1_10) :m SELECT(_r_1_12) :o BY USER(_r_1_12_13) :o VALIDATE(_r_1_15) :o REPLY(_r_1_16) :o COMMENT(_r_1_18) :o SENTIMENT ANALYSIS(_r_1_18_19) :o ADD REFERENCE(_r_1_18_20) :o CATEGORIZE(_r_1_18_21) :m SOURCE(_r_2) :m URL REDIRECTION(_r_2_3) :o DOI(_r_2_3_5) :o SCIENCE DIRECT(_r_2_3_6) :o ACM(_r_2_3_7) :o DROPBOX(_r_2_3_8) :o LOCAL FILES(_r_2_4) :m STORAGE(_r_22) :g (_r_22_26) [1,*] : HYPOTHESIS(_r_22_26_27)
